TopicTitle: How do I make the intercept information labels of targets stay put without mouseover?

Articles.Content:
How do I make the intercept information labels of targets stay put without mouseover?

I swear I saw someone do this...

Thanks.
The only target you can keep visible at the moment is the periaps and the apoaps. There is no way that I know of to set the target intercept information that way.
This is exactly the sort of thing I use MechJeb for. Primarily it's my instrument panel. The autopilot is an occasional secondary function.
It's happened to me before; I've never been able to do it intentionally, though.

Try clicking on it. It works for the Ap and Pe markers*, and I seem to recall it works for the target markers too, but I could be wrong.

*But you have to angle the view so the game doesn't ALSO think you're trying to create a maneuver node. Mouseover the Ap or Pe icon but angle it so you don't see the Maneuver node dot.
